page.title: 18Darlington Football Club
page.content: { Darlington Football Club}has won promotion to the 3rd Division. The club manager{Cyril Knowles}was inter- viewed.{ {Are you pleased to have won promotion? {CKN:} Yes, but I feel some new players are necessary in order to perform well in the higher division. {Do you forsee any ground changes for {next season. {CKN: }We are very worried over the repercussions from the Bradford fire disaster. Many clubs will have to make ground improvements. Some wooden stands may even have to be pulled down because of the fire-risk. {How do you spend a normal day? {CKN: }I arrive at the ground about 9.30 am and the players about 10 am. They train under my watchful eye until { {continued on page 19
